CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 7, 1949, pg. 3 reads: "City Hall Exhibition Proves Success - The lobby of the City-County Building was beautified last week by an exhibition of handcraft gathered from various parks, playgrounds and mothers' clubs of the Department of Parks and Recreation. Exhibits included handmade household decorations and knick-knacks, as well as purses, belts and other articles for personal adornment.  Many of the articles on display were sent in from the Wadsworth and Arlington Mothers Clubs. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Exhibition titled: "Handcraft Exhibit Mothers Clubs Department of Parks and Recreation" in the City-County Building lobby, near office of Register of Wills, Downtown
